name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Emporio Ivankov's Grand Entrance
keyMoments.description: Ivankov makes his dramatic debut, appearing on stage in New Kama Land to welcome Bentham. He reveals himself as the ruler of Level 5.5 and the legendary Queen of Kamabakka Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most important characters in the Summit War Saga who will play a crucial role in saving Luffy and the prison break.
keyMoments.quote: Welcome to the paradise of Level 5.5, The New Kama Land!

relationships.description: Inazuma serves as Ivankov's deputy commander in the Revolutionary Army and right-hand person in New Kama Land.

evolutionMoments.description: Inazuma brings Luffy and Bentham to Ivankov in New Kama Land.

reveals.information: Ruler of New Kama Land (Level 5.5) in Impel Down
Former Queen of Kamabakka Kingdom, known as the 'Okama King'
Known as the 'Miracle Person' who can perform medical miracles

keyMoments.title: Inazuma's Debut
keyMoments.description: Inazuma appears as a mysterious figure after witnessing Luffy's unconscious Haki display against the Army Wolves. They rescue Luffy and Bentham and bring them to New Kama Land.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Inazuma as a key Revolutionary Army officer who will assist in the Impel Down breakout.

relationships.description: Serves as Ivankov's deputy commander and loyal subordinate in the Revolutionary Army.

evolutionMoments.description: Inazuma acts on Ivankov's behalf, rescuing prisoners and bringing them to New Kama Land.

reveals.information: Distinctive appearance with orange and white clothing and a lightning bolt scar over the right eye
Usually seen holding a glass of wine

name.japanese: ベンサム (Mr.2 ボン・クレー)

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Breaks Luffy Out of His Cell
keyMoments.description: Bentham breaks the severely poisoned Luffy out of his Level 5 cell and carries him across the frozen wasteland in search of Emporio Ivankov.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the depth of Bentham's friendship and loyalty to Luffy, showing his complete transformation from enemy to devoted ally.

keyMoments.title: Bentham Recognizes Ivankov
keyMoments.description: Bentham realizes he has found Emporio Ivankov, the legendary Okama King and miracle worker who may be able to save Luffy's life.
keyMoments.significance: Successfully completes Bentham's quest to find help for Luffy, setting up the next phase of the arc.

relationships.description: Deep friendship forged during the Alabasta arc, with Bentham willing to sacrifice everything to save Luffy's life.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham risks everything to break Luffy out of Level 5 and find a cure for his poisoning, carrying him across the frozen wasteland.

relationships.description: Bentham knows of Ivankov's legendary reputation as the Okama King and has been searching for him.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham finally meets Ivankov in New Kama Land.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Unconscious Haki Display
keyMoments.description: Despite being severely poisoned and barely conscious, Luffy unleashes Conqueror's Haki that knocks out all the attacking Army Wolves.
keyMoments.significance: Important early display of Luffy's latent Conqueror's Haki ability, demonstrating that even in his weakest state, his willpower manifests to protect his friends.

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Level 5.5 - New Kama Land
keyMoments.description: Luffy is brought to the hidden paradise of New Kama Land where Emporio Ivankov may be able to cure his poisoning.
keyMoments.significance: Brings Luffy to the location where he will receive life-saving treatment and meet important Revolutionary Army members.

abilities.description: Luffy unconsciously uses Conqueror's Haki to knock out the Army Wolves while severely poisoned.

relationships.description: Deep friendship with Bentham, who risks everything to save Luffy's life.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham's unwavering loyalty is demonstrated as he carries the poisoned Luffy across Level 5 searching for help.

reveals.information: Demonstrated unconscious use of Conqueror's Haki even while severely poisoned

keyMoments.title: Introduction of New Kama Land Residents
keyMoments.description: Francois is shown as one of the residents celebrating in New Kama Land.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the diverse community living in the hidden paradise.

keyMoments.title: Introduction of New Kama Land Residents
keyMoments.description: Tsunokkov is shown as one of the residents celebrating in New Kama Land.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the diverse community living in the hidden paradise.

keyMoments.title: Introduction of New Kama Land Residents
keyMoments.description: Usakkov is shown as one of the residents celebrating in New Kama Land.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the diverse community living in the hidden paradise.
